physical_form.application: Egg cartons (less common due to environmental concerns)

physical_form.properties: Transparent, Durable, Recyclable, Allows visual inspection
physical_form.application: Specialty egg packaging (e.g., quail eggs, organic eggs)

fragility.properties: Good cushioning, Impact resistant to a degree

fragility.application: Used where high fragility is a concern, though declining in popularity

fragility.properties: High crush resistance, Good for stacking and transport
fragility.application: Master cartons for shipping multiple egg cartons
Specialty egg transport where individual protection is needed

fragility.properties: Suspends eggs in air, Excellent shock absorption
Separates eggs within a carton, Prevents contact
fragility.application: Higher-end cartons with individual egg protection
Used within shipping boxes for added protection

fragility.properties: Adds cushioning, Fills voids in shipping boxes

fragility.application: Specialty packaging for retail or transport

shelf_life.application: Bulk egg packaging for food service
Lining cardboard boxes for egg storage

shelf_life.properties: Removes ethylene gas, Slows ripening and spoilage (if other produce is present)
shelf_life.application: Rarely used specifically for eggs, but relevant in mixed produce shipments

shelf_life.properties: Inhibits microbial growth on the package surface
shelf_life.application: Emerging technology, could potentially extend shelf life and improve hygiene

shelf_life.properties: Removes air to inhibit microbial growth
shelf_life.application: Not typically used for whole eggs, but for processed egg products

shelf_life.properties: Reduces oxygen permeation, Extends shelf life
shelf_life.application: Pouches or overwraps for liquid egg products

shelf_life.properties: Reduces UV light exposure, Prevents degradation of egg quality

Containers for processed egg products that may be microwaved

shelf_life.properties: Maintains specific gas composition to extend shelf life

chemical_properties.properties: Chemically unreactive, Do not leach into eggs
Prevents moisture absorption, Protects against contamination

chemical_properties.application: Extending shelf life of processed egg products
Packaging for eggs stored under UV light

chemical_properties.properties: Inhibits microbial growth on packaging surface
Do not affect egg quality or safety
Free from BPA, a potentially harmful chemical
chemical_properties.application: Containers for liquid egg products (consumer preference)

chemical_properties.properties: Free from phthalates, potentially harmful chemicals
chemical_properties.application: Containers and films for egg products (consumer preference)

chemical_properties.properties: React with environment to maintain egg quality

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Easy to clean, Non-porous, Resistant to bacterial growth
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Reusable egg containers, liquid egg packaging

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Coated for moisture resistance, Reduces bacterial growth
Inhibits bacterial growth on packaging surface
Indicates if the package has been opened
Can be easily cleaned and sanitized
Prevents bacteria from penetrating the packaging
Allows gas to escape, prevents contaminants from entering
hygiene_sensitivity.application: Specialized packaging for liquid egg products

hygiene_sensitivity.properties: Sterile packaging process for extended shelf life

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Maintains cold chain, Protects against temperature fluctuations
Absorbs or releases heat, Maintains stable temperature
temperature_sensitivity.application: Advanced temperature control for egg transport

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Reflects solar radiation, Reduces heat absorption

temperature_sensitivity.application: Short-term egg transport in insulated containers

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Controls atmosphere, helps maintain temperature stability

temperature_sensitivity.application: High performance insulated containers for long distance

temperature_sensitivity.properties: Insulated covers for pallets of eggs
temperature_sensitivity.application: Maintaining temperature stability during storage and transit

Shipping containers for large quantities of eggs or egg products

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Indicates if the package has been opened or compromised

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Meets UN standards for hazardous materials transport

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Contain materials for cleaning up spills

volatility_or_hazard_risk.properties: Prevents leaks from reaching the environment
Provides information on hazards and safe handling

Allows partial visibility, Combines branding with visual appeal

Difficult to remove, Leaves a residue if tampered with
Conceals the contents, Reduces visual theft appeal
Can be detected by metal detectors
